About me…¶

CHENG TSZ CHUNG

2003
born in Hong Kong
watercolor painter

As a painter focusing on watercolor, my inspiration mainly comes from nature, especially the sky. My works are influenced by both Impressionism and Chinese art, hoping to turn moments in nature into eternity through painting.
